channel.title: feedburner on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in feedburner on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Working on The Blog
item.description: This is a perfect example for a seemingly easy task taking up so much of one’s time. I have been busy working on this blog for a last couple of days. I spent so much time and yet there are so many things to do! Here is what I have done so far: Updated feed through FeedBurner: this was already present, I updated some settings. Added Google AdSense: there comes a time in everyone’s life when they turn greedy.
